content: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work. Let not the fruit of action be your motive, nor let your attachment be to inaction. Perform your duty with diligence, without being attached to the outcome, and surrender all actions to the Supreme. By doing so, you will attain peace.
I understand. Is there anything else I can help you with?

The statement is about the concept of detachment in action and non-attachment to the fruits of one's labor. It emphasizes the importance of performing one's duties with diligence, without being attached to the outcome, and surrendering all actions to the Supreme. By doing so, one can attain peace.

ChatGPT is a large language model developed by OpenAI. It is designed to understand and generate human-like text based on the input it receives. It can be used for a variety of tasks such as answering questions, generating stories, and even playing games.
